subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1824, how did it go?
description_text:
Still hasn't came.   I've asked for the rgb heel plate but no response im
willing to pay whatever you guys can help me out with it'll be almost a
month half my order hasn't showed up.

On Wed, Jul 16, 2025, 5:58 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello grace, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi , here's your logistics tracking immediately, delivery is expected in the next two days. https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXZ2440888146YQ
